headline: Ed Filipowski, 58, Pioneer  In Fashion Public Relations  Who Refused to Be Rattled
abstract: “He was not emotional about fashion,” a colleague said. “He was steady.” He was also influential.
lead_paragraph: Ed Filipowski, a public relations executive who became one of the fashion industry’s most influential behind-the-scenes players through his work with companies like Gucci, Versace and Marc Jacobs, died on Friday at his home in Manhattan. He was 58.
